onlineAddresses.caption: The Blast: Spoken Word Artist Prince Ea Hosts Premiere of Doc Focusing on Teen Mental Health
The Speech I Gave to Our World Leaders
I Am NOT Black, You are NOT White
I Crashed the Final 2020 Presidential Debate

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Prince Ea is a celebrated American spoken word artist, poet, rapper, filmmaker, and speaker.
  • Through his YouTube Channel - which has garnered more than 2 billion views and racked up nearly 6 million subscribers - and Snap series, he beautifully and succinctly covers topics, such as environmentalism, race, mental health & wellness, work-life balance, and spirituality. 
  • Prince Ea also speaks at conferences and government forums worldwide on the topics of self-development, living your passion, and the importance of being motivated and engaged.
  • He has partnered with Kenneth Cole, Chevrolet, and Ford, among others. His work has been widely recognized and documented, in such platforms as Oprah’s SuperSoul 100 and Forbes’ 30 Under 30 list.

speakerBiography.text:
Prince Ea is a celebrated American spoken word artist, poet, rapper, filmmaker, and speaker. Through his YouTube Channel - which has garnered more than 2 billion views and racked up nearly 6 million subscribers - and Snap series, he beautifully and succinctly covers topics, such as environmentalism, race, mental health & wellness, work-life balance, and spirituality. 

Prince Ea also speaks at conferences and government forums worldwide on the topics of self-development, living your passion, and the importance of being motivated and engaged. He has partnered with Kenneth Cole, Chevrolet, and Ford, among others. His work has been widely recognized and documented, in such platforms as Oprah’s SuperSoul 100 and Forbes’ 30 Under 30 list.
